entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
